title: Césaire's interpretation of the nature of prec...

content.prompt: Césaire’s interpretation of the nature of precolonial societies is most directly influenced by which of the following?

choices.label: The capitalist principle that markets will self-regulate
The Marxist idea that early societies were classless
The Social Darwinist concept of the survival of the fittest
The totalitarian concept of the primacy of group interests over individual interests

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
